snippet.title: Crypt Custodian ► Release Date Reveal For PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Get ready to explore the afterlife and beat up monsters with your broom - when Crypt Custodian launches on August 27! Step into the shoes of Pluto; a mischievous cat who's just died, and after a disastrous meeting with the Afterlife Guardian is sentenced to be the afterworld's janitor... FOREVER!!!

Crypt Custodian launches on PC, PS5, PS4, the Xbox Family, and Nintendo Switch. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2394650/Crypt_Custodian/
